SELECT A.ID, A.ORDER_NUMBER, A.MCH_CODE, A.FAULT_DESC, A.FAULT_IMAGE_ID, A.DUTY_PERSON_ID, A.STATUS, A.SOURCE_TYPE, A.SOURCE_ORDER_ID, A.SOURCE_ORDER_ITEM_ID, A.REPAIR_DESC, A.REPAIR_DATETIME, A.STAGE_DATETIME, A.EXCEPTION_TYPE, A.EXCEPTION_SUBCLASS, A.MOULD, A.REASON, A.HANDLE_METHOD, A.IS_CLOSED, A.LONG_TERM_MEASURE, A.CREATED_TIME, A.CREATED_BY, A.UPDATED_TIME, A.UPDATED_BY, B.MCH_NAME, B.SPEC, B.TYPE_VERSION, B.FACTORY_NO, B.EQUIP_NUMBER FROM EM_REPAIR_ORDER A LEFT JOIN EM_EQUIPMENT B ON A.MCH_CODE = B.MCH_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND A.STATUS IN ('0', '1')
AND (A.MCH_CODE = #{mchCode} OR B.EQUIP_NUMBER=#{mchCode})
AND A.DUTY_PERSON_ID = #{user}
ORDER BY A.CREATED_TIME
